post:
I don't need it anymore and looking to transfer it to someone for $15. I think that's pretty reasonable. Have hardly used it, bought it due to a "special." Damn marketing, but it's a pretty good price nonetheless! This is paid until May 10th/2014

Server is located in NY, Buffalo, but you can contact blueVM and have them transfer you somewhere else if you'd like.

Thanks!
